timeline.message:
Reactive Streams impl

Signed-off-by: Daniel Kec <daniel.kec@oracle.com>

Fixes for issues found by @olotenko

Signed-off-by: Daniel Kec <daniel.kec@oracle.com>

Fix issues found by @olotenko round 2

  * Recursion depth check optimization(quick fix)
  * More effective buffer drain, thx @olotenko
  * Removing "recursion leak" from filter processor
  * Removing unnecessary buffered parent from symmetrical processors

Signed-off-by: Daniel Kec <daniel.kec@oracle.com>

Checkstyle fix
